title: When you see a Rioter posting for the first time in months

replies.body: Posting here seems relevant.
[insert generic riot hate here]

BetaDude40 uses [generic riot hate]
It's not very effective.
Griftrix counters with [I love our players].

The foes BetaDude40 avoided the attack!

The Foes BetaDude 40 Bought some RP!

Griftrix restored all its health from its ability 'Cash Flow'!

> [{quoted}](name=The Dunk God,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-25T16:54:41.566+0000)
>
> Griftrix restored all its health from its ability 'Fidel Cash Flow'!

i'm sorry i had to.
http://www.auplod.com/u/uaodpl7843f.jpeg
Wait a second... isn't salt type supposed to be super effective against red type...?

Other way around. This is especially true for the Player Behavior type.

"Banhammer" and "Smite" are really, really OP...
So Riot is Crawdaunt then?
riot is kingler.
they aren't a Dark type.

I know some good counters!
-Nerf fizz
-Buff towers
-Lower Death timers.

Cmon, you gotta use at LEAST one of them!
[something something telling animation people that zed needs nerfs instead of telling someone on the balance team]
[inserts poros]
What why did you insert me, what did you need?
you are good stuffing :3
eh ... what?
So he is gonna escape since you threw an ordinary pokeball then dip out is what you are saying?
To be fair, Ash is VERY stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=Nilok,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-03-25T11:31:58.255+0000)
>
> To be fair, Ash is VERY stupid.

what did you expect he is not growing up or visiting a school?

"Was the child born with it, or cursed?"

...Cursed.


I now have a new headcanon that what Ash saw wasn't Ho-Oh, but MissingNo. in bird form and has corrupted Ash's age.

What if.. Ash is the son of {{champion:22}} , and he is immortal because his father {{champion:23}} used his ultimate move when creating him. But due to a bug one of the summoners portal threw him to a completely different world where a woman found him and raised him up.
Idk, but i'll guess {{champion:22}} loved {{champion:23}} 's *ultimate move*

> [{quoted}](name=Faustavian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-25T23:57:21.458+0000)
>
> Idk, but i'll guess {{champion:22}} loved {{champion:23}} 's *ultimate move*

It's super effective!

Ashe fainted!

Which Pokemon will you choose?
XP {{champion:127}} XP XP {{champion:113}}

> [{quoted}](name=Faustavian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-25T23:57:21.458+0000)
>
> Idk, but i'll guess {{champion:22}} loved {{champion:23}} 's *ultimate move*

Pause

> [{quoted}](name=Nilok,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-03-25T11:31:58.255+0000)
>
> To be fair, Ash is VERY stupid.

{{champion:22}} "I heard that!"
{{champion:23}} "He means the kid on TV."
{{champion:22}} "Oh. . ."
well {{champion:22}}  the champion is pretty stupid with that perma slow
also probably the weakest adc right now
doesn't mean her permaslow isn't a unfun game mechanic

A lot of Items mimic Champions abilities.
One such item is {{item:3022}}  You ever tried to run from a dead sion with this item?
THAT is an unfun game mechanic...
R.I.P your common sense. that is not unfun because otherwise his passive is useless  AA's are never useless
Accurate

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-25T09:38:56.576+0000)
>
> Accurate

Should have thrown a masterball nub :3
remeber the glitch where u can clone Masterballs at the Pokecenter ( Gameboy Color ) ? XDDD
Pokemon Center? Screw that, I'm going to the eldritch "bird" thing on the shore.

ohhh :D i remember  wasnt it that guy  http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/9/96/Sailor_OD.png  ?


u actually remeber this MF https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MissingNo. ? ;D bahaha
Missingno is the only true way to clone items! Others are cheating

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-25T09:37:52.008+0000)
>
> So he is gonna escape since you threw an ordinary pokeball then dip out is what you are saying?

Shoulda used the Ultra Ball. Or, y'know, Mean Look and pray he doesn't trigger the Roar Glitch. Ash isn't exactly the best trainer.

> [{quoted}](name=Eevee Girl Alex,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-03-25T11:38:08.512+0000)
>
> Shoulda used the Ultra Ball. Or, y'know, Mean Look and pray he doesn't trigger the Roar Glitch. Ash isn't exactly the best trainer.

> [{quoted}](name=Nilok,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-03-25T11:31:58.255+0000)
>
> To be fair, Ash is VERY stupid.

LvL 100 pikachu, still loses fights to other pokemon. The baddie.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2016-03-25T11:46:08.531+0000)
>
> LvL 100 pikachu, still loses fights to other pokemon. The baddie.

It's actually semi-canon (never stated, but pretty much accepted by fans) that Pikachu resets to level 5 each time he goes to a new region, so without watching the anime up to that point, it'd be hard for me to gauge what level he was at the time. I'm guessing between 40-60 because he's standing up to an Entei.
http://i.imgur.com/7olYcAz.jpg
http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/9/95/Dream_Master_Ball_Sprite.png
D:
http://pm1.narvii.com/5886/7fd54ac29dbe0870c9860e7ee4911e134500b4cb_hq.jpg
Pokemon Emerald, every. Single. TIME!

Me:
http://media0.giphy.com/media/BVaScAMm4UcW4/giphy.gif

Finally! I never knew what he was writing because the gif always restarted too fast!

Still don't get why it's here though
I'm just finally realizing that that's a shiny entei.

> [{quoted}](name=SpongebobIsLife,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jPlvIEsp,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-25T15:34:56.328+0000)
>
> I'm just finally realizing that that's a shiny entei.

Yup. From the Zoroark movie.

RIP Gen IV. Hated how slow text was though. Still better than the random Ice Cream Cones, Garbage piles or Lampshades of Gen V.

I still hate Muk and Grimer too.
